Kamal Amin Awad ( Arabic ) (1923–1979) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-ese ihe na Egypt n'ihe gbasara eserese. A mụrụ onye na-ese ihe, onye ọrụ ya na usoro ya pụrụ iche masịrị nka ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Egypt, na Tanta n'afọ 1923
O nwere mmasị ịkụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ ya banyere usoro ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na mba ofesi na-etinye
Otú ọ dị, ọ na-achọsi ike iji nkà nke ndị bu ya ụzọ n'oge ochie mee ihe n'ihi nkà ndị Fero, Coptic, Islam na Folk nke Ijipt bara ọgaranya
N'ihi ya, o nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụdị pụrụ iche na ọrụ ya
Ọrụ dị iche iche nke onye na-ese ihe nyeere ya aka ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto, onye na-akpụ ihe, na onye na-ese ihe
O nwetara ihe nrite nke klas mbụ nke nka na sayensị n'afọ 1974.
Kamal Amin gụrụ akwụkwọ na Institute of book art na Urbino, Italy.
Kamal Amin lụrụ nwanyị Sweden ma nwee ụmụ abụọ.
